an4.110:1.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro asivisupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.110:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo agataviso hoti, na ghoraviso?
an4.110:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhinham kujjhati.
an4.110:2.3: So ca khvassa kodho na digharattam anuseti.
an4.110:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo agataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
an4.110:2.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, asiviso agataviso, na ghoraviso;
an4.110:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na agataviso?
an4.110:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhinham kujjhati.
an4.110:3.3: So ca khvassa kodho digharattam anuseti.
an4.110:3.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na agataviso.
an4.110:3.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, asiviso ghoraviso, na agataviso;
an4.110:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo agataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca?
an4.110:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhinham kujjhati.
an4.110:4.3: So ca khvassa kodho digharattam anuseti.
an4.110:4.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo agataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca.
an4.110:4.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, asiviso agataviso ca ghoraviso ca;
an4.110:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevagataviso hoti na ghoraviso?
an4.110:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhinham kujjhati.
an4.110:5.3: So ca khvassa kodho na digharattam anuseti.
an4.110:5.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevagataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
an4.110:5.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, asiviso nevagataviso na ghoraviso;
an4.110:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro asivisupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
